channel.title: New home/item death help
channel.description: how do you change the home so people start out there and where do you change it so you dont lose items on death [614 rsps]

item.title: New home/item death help
item.dc:creator: @x1_att_ftw_x x1 att ftw x
item.description:
@x1_att_ftw_x wrote:

First, teleport to your current home, type ::mypos to find the coordinates of your home.

Go into Player.java and search for you current homes x coord.

Replace the teleportToX and teleportToY coords with your new home coords. This changes where new players start.

Read full topic
